metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9282 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In Mahara 18.10 before 18.10.5, 19.04 before 19.04.4, and 19.10 before 19.10.2, certain personal information is discoverable inspecting network responses on the 'Edit access' screen when sharing portfolios.

criterions.comment: mahara: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
